channel.title: How do u add banks and stuff
channel.description:
I have a few questions about autospawn, npc's, and world objects. Please answer them if you can
Ok first, I wanted to know how you spawn an npc, so he is stationary. I know that you go into autospawnand then add him to the list, with his id and stuff, but when I compile, and then turn my server on, the server messes up, and it won't log in. So could you tell me how to correctly autospawn an npc.
Ok, the other question: I was wondering how you make, say like, a bank appear. When I go into global objects, and insert the numbers and compile, then turn my server on, the bank is not there, as if i never typed it into the global objects thing.
Ok that's about it. Thx for your time.

item.title: How do u add banks and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

with the bank you need to make a new case in your first click object or second click object method.

Add

Case (BANK ID): openupbank(); break:

Read full topic
item.source: How do u add banks and stuff

item.title: How do u add banks and stuff
item.dc:creator: @Bmaw Bmaw
item.description:
@Bmaw wrote:

When you are adding the Npc in autospawn you have to use the tab key. if you hit space a bunch of times it won’t work. I had the same problem

To add global objects go in client.java and search for

public void NewObjects() {

Then add your objects under that like this:

public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(3568, 9677, 1747, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2347, 3700, 2485, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2347, 3695, 2482, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2347, 3691, 2481, 0, 10);

The first to numbers are the X and Y coords, the third number is the object id and idk what the last 2 are but i just always put 0 and ten

Read full topic
item.source: How do u add banks and stuff
